trans-unit.source: Contains properties and methods to provide consistent look and feel to all root designers on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Innehåller egenskaper och metoder för att förse alla rot designers på ett arbetsflöde designytan konsekvent utseende.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Typically, an instance of a sequential workflow root designer class is created when a workflow is created in a workflow designer and it represents the designer surface on which users can add and edit activities.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]En instans av ett sekventiellt arbetsflöde rot designer klassen skapas vanligtvis när ett arbetsflöde skapas i en arbetsflödesdesigner och det representerar designytan där användare kan lägga till och redigera aktiviteter.

trans-unit.source: A workflow root designer does not have a parent designer unless it is the child of an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: En rotdesigner för arbetsflödet har inte en överordnad designer om det inte är underordnad en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity>aktivitet.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity>

trans-unit.source: All workflow root designers must derive from SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.
trans-unit.target: Alla arbetsflödet rot designers måste härledas från SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref> can be set as the parent of the activity associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar ett värde som anger om en <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"> </xref> kan anges som överordnat aktiviteten som associeras med designern.

trans-unit.source: Root designers cannot have a parent activity designer on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Rot-designers kan inte ha en överordnad Aktivitetsdesigner i ett arbetsflöde designytan.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in an inheriting class, CanBeParentedTo returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Om det inte åsidosätts i en ärvande klass CanBeParentedTo returnerar `false`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> to check.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> att kontrollera.

trans-unit.source: to allow the activity associated with parentActivityDesigner to be the parent of the activity associated with the ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: att tillåta aktiviteten som associeras med parentActivityDesigner som överordnad till aktiviteten som associeras med den , annars .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer can be expanded and collapsed.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om designern kan expanderas och döljs.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a deriving class, CanExpandCollapse is always set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Om det inte åsidosätts i en härledande CanExpandCollapse alltid som `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref> can be expanded and collapsed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref> kan vara expanderade och komprimerade, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the footer associated with the root designer.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar sidfoten som är associerade med rotdesigner.

trans-unit.source: The contents of Footer appear at the bottom of the root designer on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Innehållet i sidfoten visas längst ned i rotdesigner i designvyn i arbetsflödet.

trans-unit.source: Icons and text can be displayed in the footer, including button icons that change the designer view when a user selects one of them.
trans-unit.target: Ikoner och text kan visas i sidfoten, inklusive ikonerna som ändrar designer när en användare väljer ett av dem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref> that represents the footer associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"> </xref> som representerar sidfoten som är associerade med den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of points that represent the inner connection of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en skrivskyddad samling som representerar den inre anslutningen i designern.

trans-unit.source: A designer can have connectors within it.
trans-unit.target: En designer kan ha kopplingar i den.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"></xref> on which to gather the collection of connection points.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"> </xref> som du vill samla in insamling av anslutningspunkter.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> objects used for a connectable designer.
trans-unit.target: En samling som innehåller den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> objekt som används för anslutningsbara designer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of glyphs that are displayed on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar uppsättning med tecken som visas på den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection"></xref> that contains the glyphs displayed on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection"> </xref> som innehåller tecken som visas på den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the header associated with the root designer.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar rubriken som är associerade med rotdesigner.

trans-unit.source: The contents of Header appear at the top of the root designer on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Innehållet i huvudet visas överst i rotdesigner i designvyn i arbetsflödet.

trans-unit.source: Icons and text can be displayed in the header, including text that indicates the designer view that is currently displayed on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Ikoner och text kan visas i rubriken, inklusive text som anger designer vyn som visas i designvyn.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref> that represents the header associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"> </xref> som representerar den rubrik som är associerade med den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the image associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar avbildningen som associeras med designern.

trans-unit.source: Image property is set to the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> to display.
trans-unit.target: Image-egenskapen anges till den <xref:System.Drawing.Image>ska visas.</xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: You can do this at design time or at run time.
trans-unit.target: Du kan göra detta i designläge eller vid körning.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a derived class, Image returns a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Om det inte åsidosätts i härledda klassen avbildningen returnerar en null-referens (`Nothing` i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to associate with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> associera med designern.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value for the enclosing bounds of the image associated with the designer in logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar värdet för omslutande gränserna för avbildningen som associeras med designern i logiska koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Use the ImageRectangle to retrieve the coordinates for the rectangle that encloses the image associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Använd ImageRectangle för att hämta koordinaterna för rektangelns som omsluter det bild kopplad till designern.

trans-unit.source: You can use these coordinates for drawing connectors or overlaying graphics.
trans-unit.target: Du kan använda dessa koordinater för att rita kopplingar eller ovanpå grafik.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that encloses the <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> displayed for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som omsluter det <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> visas för den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> that requested the sequential workflow root designer to be initialized.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> som begärt rotdesigner sekventiellt arbetsflöde ska initieras.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> that requested the workflow root designer to be initialized.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> som begärt rotdesigner arbetsflödet ska initieras.

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum size for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den minimala storleken för den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: MinimumSize represents the smallest size to which a user can resize the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: MinimumSize representerar den minsta storlek som en användare kan ändra storlek på <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the minimum size of the sequential workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerar den minimala storleken för sekventiella Arbetsflödesdesignern.

trans-unit.source: Sets the size of the visual cues on the designers contained within the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anger storleken på de visuella tips om designers som ingår i den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the layout arguments.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller argumenten layout.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the size of the visual cues on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerar storleken på visuell information på den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Draws any headers and footers associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ritar alla sidhuvuden och sidfötter som är associerade med den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: OnPaint draws any text to include in the headers and footers with the appropriate theme settings.
trans-unit.target: OnPaint ritar text ska ingå i sidhuvuden och sidfötter med lämpliga Temainställningar.

trans-unit.source: It also draws any images to include in the headers and footers.
trans-unit.target: Det ger också alla bilder ska ingå i sidhuvuden och sidfötter.

trans-unit.source: **Note** When you override OnPaint in a derived class, be sure to call the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnPaint%2A> method of the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: **Obs** när du åsidosätta OnPaint i en härledd klass måste du anropa den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnPaint%2A>metoden för basklassen så som registrerats delegater tar emot händelsen.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnPaint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: einnehåller en null-referens ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer whether smart tags are to be shown or hidden on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Meddelar designern om smarta etiketter ska visas eller döljas på den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When called, OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged invalidates the text rectangle associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A>.
trans-unit.target: När den anropas, upphäver OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged textrutan som är associerade med <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Note** When you override OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged%2A> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: **Obs** när du åsidosätta OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged i en härledd klass måste du anropa klassen base <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged%2A>metoden som har registrerats delegater tar emot händelsen.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display smart tags on the designer surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Visa smarta etiketter på designytan; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the root designer displays smart tags.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om rotdesigner visar smarta etiketter.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A> property is not set to a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) and the corresponding <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Text%2A> property is not an empty string or set to a null reference (`Nothing`), ShowSmartTag returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Om den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A>egenskapen inte har angetts som en null-referens (`Nothing` i Visual Basic) och motsvarande <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Text%2A>-egenskapen är inte en tom sträng eller ange en null-referens (`Nothing`), ShowSmartTag returnerar `true`.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Text%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref> displays smart tags; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref> visar smarta etiketter, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle on the designer surface in which to display a smart tag.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar rektangeln på designytan som ska visas en smart etikett.

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.ShowSmartTag%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.SmartTagVerbs%2A> to display a smart tag of available <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.DesignerActions%2A> at the location specified by SmartTagRectangle.
trans-unit.target: Du kan använda <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.ShowSmartTag%2A>och <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.SmartTagVerbs%2A>att visa en smart etikett av tillgängliga <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.DesignerActions%2A>på den plats som anges av SmartTagRectangle.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.DesignerActions%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.SmartTagVerbs%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.ShowSmartTag%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the bounds in which to display the smart tag.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som definierar kontrollens gränser som ska visas i etiketten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the description associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en beskrivning som associeras med designern.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in an inheriting class, Text returns <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Om det inte åsidosätts i en ärvande klass returnerar Text <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the description associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: En sträng som innehåller en beskrivning som associeras med designern.

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the title area of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar höjden på rubrikområdet i Designer.

trans-unit.source: A root designer title area typically contains the header and any icon associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: En rot-designer rubrikområdet innehåller vanligen rubriken och en ikon som associeras med designern.

trans-unit.source: TitleHeight calculates the integer it returns by getting the value of its base implementation and adding the height integer defined for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A>.
trans-unit.target: TitleHeight beräknar heltal som returneras genom att hämta värdet på dess grundläggande implementering och lägga till det höjd heltal som definierats för <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A>

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the height of the title area of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ett heltal som representerar höjden på rubrikområdet av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.
